title: Thomas Edison on "The Doctor of the Future"
subtitle: Rumors: The inventor Thomas Edison said that the future doctor would not give any medicine, but would interest his patients in caring for the human framework, in the diet and in the cause and prevention of unconsciousness.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Thomas Edison said that "the doctor of the future will not give any medicine but will interest his patients in the care of the human framework, in the diet and in the cause and prevention of disease."
